data.lyric:
[ti:Oh Santa!]
[ar:Mariah Carey/Ariana Grande/Jennifer Hudson]
[al:Oh Santa!]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Oh Santa! - Mariah Carey (玛丽亚·凯莉)/Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)/Jennifer Hudson (詹尼佛·哈德森)
[00:00.96]Lyrics by：Mariah Carey/Jermaine Dupri/Bryan-Michael Cox
[00:01.92]Composed by：Mariah Carey/Jermaine Dupri/Bryan-Michael Cox
[00:02.88]Oh Santa's gonna come and make him mine this Christmas
[00:06.28]Santa's gonna come and make him mine mine
[00:08.77]Oh Santa
[00:09.66]Santa's gonna come and make him mine this Christmas
[00:12.03]Oh Santa
[00:12.64]Santa's gonna come and make him mine mine
[00:15.47]Santa
[00:17.03]If you get this letter
[00:18.18]Won't you help me out
[00:19.82]I know you're kinda busy with your elves right now
[00:22.73]And I don't know how
[00:24.51]You do the things you do while I sleep on Christmas eve
[00:28.70]But it's amazing
[00:30.37]And I bet that you could bring me back my baby
[00:33.45]Because every time I see Christmas lights
[00:36.80]I feel this burn inside
[00:38.08]And I just can't take it
[00:40.59]I saw them shopping last week
[00:43.59]And his new girl was so bleak
[00:46.49]And then I swore to myself
[00:49.21]Santa's gonna come and make him mine this Christmas night
[00:53.68]Ho ho ho
[00:55.33]Santa's gonna come and make you mine this Christmas
[00:58.27]Santa's gonna come and make you mine ho ho ho
[01:01.35]Santa's gonna come and make you mine this Christmas night
[01:04.72]Oh Santa
[01:05.92]I heard that it's really gonna snow this year
[01:09.08]So I hope Rudolph and them other eight reindeer
[01:11.61]Get you safely here
[01:13.21]So you can scoop him up and swoop him right down my chimney
[01:18.19]I've been really really really good this year
[01:21.21]So put on that red suit and make him appear
[01:24.00]'Cause Christmas cheer
[01:25.62]Just ain't the same without my baby
[01:27.38]Come on oh Kris Kringle send me help
[01:29.68]They say it's unrealistic
[01:32.49]But I believe in you Saint Nick
[01:35.36]So grant this wish for me right quick
[01:38.07]Santa won't you come and make him mine this Christmas night
[01:42.63]Ho ho ho
[01:44.12]Santa's gonna come and make you mine this Christmas
[01:47.31]Santa's gonna come and make you mine ho ho ho
[01:50.26]Santa's gonna come and make you mine this Christmas night
[01:55.83]Oh Santa
[01:58.82]Oh Santa
[02:01.78]Oh Santa
[02:04.46]Come on Santa
[02:05.63]Santa gon' come and make him mine this Christmas
[02:08.60]Santa gon' come and make him mine mine
[02:11.60]Santa gon' come and make him mine this Christmas
[02:14.78]Santa gon' come and make him mine mine
[02:17.45]Oh Santa Claus
[02:19.31]If you get this letter please don't make me wait
[02:22.35]'Cause all December I'll be counting down the days
[02:24.96]So hop on your sleigh
[02:26.94]I promise that I won't forget the milk and cookies
[02:30.43]The trees all sparkly and gold
[02:33.66]But inside I feel so cold
[02:36.55]So soon as you leave the North Pole
[02:39.23]Santa won't you come and make him mine this Christmas
[02:48.38]Santa's gonna come and make you mine ho ho ho
[02:51.50]Santa's gonna come and make you mine this Christmas
[02:54.55]Santa's gonna come and make you mine ho ho ho
[02:57.49]Santa's gonna come and make you mine mine
[03:00.50]Santa's gonna come and make you mine ho ho ho
[03:03.66]Santa's gonna come and make you mine this Christmas
[03:06.70]Santa's gonna come and make you mine ho ho ho
[03:09.79]Santa's gonna come and make you mine mine
[03:11.83]Santa gon' come and make you mine this Christmas
data.trans:
[ti:Oh Santa!]
[ar:Mariah Carey/Ariana Grande/Jennifer Hudson]
[al:Oh Santa!]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.96]//
[00:01.92]//
[00:02.88]圣诞老人就要到来 在此佳节为我寻觅良缘  
[00:06.28]圣诞老人就要到来 为我寻觅良缘  
[00:08.77]圣诞老人
[00:09.66]圣诞老人就要到来 在此佳节为我寻觅佳偶  
[00:12.03]圣诞老人
[00:12.64]圣诞老人就要到来 为我寻觅良缘  
[00:15.47]圣诞老人
[00:17.03]若你收到此封来信
[00:18.18]能否帮我一个小忙
[00:19.82]我知道你和你的精灵们忙得晕头转向
[00:22.73]当我在圣诞前夕沉沉睡去时
[00:24.51]我不知道你是如何施展魔法
[00:28.70]但这简直不可思议
[00:30.37]我猜你可以让我的宝贝重回我的怀抱
[00:33.45]因为每当圣诞彩灯亮起
[00:36.80]我的内心十分煎熬
[00:38.08]无法忍受这般感觉
[00:40.59]他的新女友是多么逊色
[00:43.59]我看见他们在超市购物
[00:46.49]然后我在内心暗自发誓
[00:49.21]圣诞老人就要到来 在圣诞夜为我寻觅佳偶   
[00:53.68]//
[00:55.33]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[00:58.27]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[01:01.35]圣诞老人就要到来 今夜只为你我牵线 
[01:04.72]圣诞老人
[01:05.92]听说今年将会大雪纷飞
[01:09.08]我希望鲁道夫和那八只驯鹿
[01:11.61]可以把你安全送达我这
[01:13.21]你可以把他抱起塞到我的烟囱里
[01:18.19]今年我的生活十分美满
[01:21.21]所以穿上你的红色套装 让他快点出现
[01:24.00]因为如果没有我的宝贝伴我身旁
[01:25.62]我将难以体会圣诞节的欢乐
[01:27.38]来吧 圣诞老人 帮我一把
[01:29.68]人们说这不切实际
[01:32.49]但是我相信你 圣诞老人
[01:35.36]所以 快点实现我的圣诞愿望
[01:38.07]圣诞老人 就在圣诞夜为我寻觅佳偶吧
[01:42.63]//
[01:44.12]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[01:47.31]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[01:50.26]圣诞老人就要到来 今夜只为你我牵线
[01:55.83]圣诞老人
[01:58.82]圣诞老人
[02:01.78]圣诞老人
[02:04.46]来吧圣诞老人
[02:05.63]圣诞老人就要到来 在此佳节为我寻觅佳偶  
[02:08.60]圣诞老人就要到来 为我寻觅良缘
[02:11.60]圣诞老人就要到来 在此佳节为我寻觅佳偶  
[02:14.78]圣诞老人就要到来 为我寻觅良缘
[02:17.45]圣诞老人 
[02:19.31]若你收到此封来信 请别让我久等
[02:22.35]因在整个十二月 我都在倒数
[02:24.96]所以坐上你的雪橇
[02:26.94]我发誓我不会忘记温热牛奶和美味饼干
[02:30.43]还有那金光闪闪的圣诞树
[02:33.66]但是我的内心却冰冷不已
[02:36.55]当你离开北极之后
[02:39.23]就为我寻觅佳偶吧
[02:48.38]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[02:51.50]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[02:54.55]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[02:57.49]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[03:00.50]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[03:03.66]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[03:06.70]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[03:09.79]圣诞老人就要到来 只为你我牵线
[03:11.83]圣诞老人就要到来 在此佳节只为你我牵线
